bio: I am a Full Stack Developer

education.description: Talking a little bit about me, I am a web developer with an entrepreneurial mindset that is constantly searching for new challenges and looking to learn cutting-edge technologies with the aim of implementing innovative solutions trying to solve the problems of the clients the best as possible. I have knowledge of a lot of technologies that I have to use professionally in frontend, backend, servers, etc so I consider myself a Full Stack developer, but if you are here looking for my superpowers or something like that, I am particularly good with PHP, NodeJs and Vuejs but my secret is getting things done. As simple as that.

experience.jobDescription: In this job, I work as a full-stack developer on an existing platform. I have the responsibility to make different fixes to the platform and new features as needed.
I am working developing a web application developer with Django and Vue
I worked on a remote project as a team leader and developer in a MVP called 'MyDiiary'. This MVP was developed using the MEVN stack
scratch the furniture. Good now the other hand, too lay on arms while you're using the keyboard.

name: Samuel Urias
